channel.title: Comments on: Best Drone Cameras 2017 – Buyer’s Guide
channel.description: Top rated Techs, Products and Reviews

item.title: By: Spenser
item.dc:creator: Spenser
item.description: I've used the DJI Mavic Pro for some months now. And it's way cooler than i had expected it to be. Seeing it on your list goes far to show how amazing the Dji mavi pro is.
item.content:encoded: I’ve used the DJI Mavic Pro for some months now. And it’s way cooler than i had expected it to be. Seeing it on your list goes far to show how amazing the Dji mavi pro is.

item.title: By: Brian Mutende
item.dc:creator: Brian Mutende
item.description: Sorry. I now realize that its because its relatively cheaper.
item.content:encoded: Sorry. I now realize that its because its relatively cheaper.

item.title: By: Brian Mutende
item.dc:creator: Brian Mutende
item.description: Why is the Phantom 3 on this list? It was released quit a long time ago.
item.content:encoded: Why is the Phantom 3 on this list? It was released quit a long time ago.

item.title: By: Mike
item.dc:creator: Mike
item.description: Wow. With this kind of detail in your reviews, it's no wonder you're checking all of Google's boxes. Very impressive, outsourced or not.
item.content:encoded: Wow. With this kind of detail in your reviews, it’s no wonder you’re checking all of Google’s boxes. Very impressive, outsourced or not.

item.title: By: Raheel Ahmed
item.dc:creator: Raheel Ahmed
item.description: Hi, Thank you for the tip about the Autel Robotics X-Star Premium, no doubt its a good drone and is capable to make its place in some good performers. The purpose of the list is to include the best performers in different categories e.g top performers, best value for the money etc. We have tried hard to include the best ones in their respective categories. We will consider your recommendation about Autel Robotics X-Star Premium in our upcoming list update. Cheers!
item.content:encoded:
Hi,
Thank you for the tip about the Autel Robotics X-Star Premium, no doubt its a good drone and is capable to make its place in some good performers. The purpose of the list is to include the best performers in different categories e.g top performers, best value for the money etc. We have tried hard to include the best ones in their respective categories. We will consider your recommendation about Autel Robotics X-Star Premium in our upcoming list update.
Cheers!

item.title: By: Raheel Ahmed
item.dc:creator: Raheel Ahmed
item.description: Hi Mike, The GoPro Karma drone bundle includes the Hero Black 5 with 4K video, voice control, one-button simplicity, touch display and waterproof design. Hope it helps :) Cheers!
item.content:encoded:
Hi Mike,
The GoPro Karma drone bundle includes the Hero Black 5 with 4K video, voice control, one-button simplicity, touch display and waterproof design. Hope it helps ??
Cheers!

item.title: By: cool tech
item.dc:creator: cool tech
item.description: Hey, Thanks so much for this list of drone cameras! I recently got an inexpensive drone for Christmas and I love it! It is so fun to take pictures from above, I can't wait until the weather gets nicer so I can test it out some more! Best, Dennis
item.content:encoded:
Hey,
Thanks so much for this list of drone cameras! I recently got an inexpensive drone for Christmas and I love it! It is so fun to take pictures from above, I can’t wait until the weather gets nicer so I can test it out some more!
Best,
Dennis

item.title: By: Yeti
item.dc:creator: Yeti
item.description: I like your Blog but wonder why you did not include the Autel Robotics X-Star Premium in the list. It has better 4K camera than the Phantom. Retails for $7.99. Comes with a customized hard shell case. I have seen tons of positive YouTube reviews. My preference is the DJI Mavic pro.
item.content:encoded: I like your Blog but wonder why you did not include the Autel Robotics X-Star Premium in the list. It has better 4K camera than the Phantom. Retails for $7.99. Comes with a customized hard shell case. I have seen tons of positive YouTube reviews. My preference is the DJI Mavic pro.

item.title: By: Mike
item.dc:creator: Mike
item.description: Does the GoPro Karma come with a camera or you have to buy it separately? If so, what is the resolution for the original camera?
item.content:encoded: Does the GoPro Karma come with a camera or you have to buy it separately? If so, what is the resolution for the original camera?
